Sipna College of Enginnering And Technology, Amravati

Event Name : SPAZIO

Date and Time : 8th February 2024

Location : Sipna College of Engineering And Technology, Amravati

Codes for different Domains:

i) Computer Science Engineering & Information Technology (CSE & IT)
ii) Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering (EXTC)
iii) Civil Engineering (CE)
iv) Mechanical Engineering (ME)
v) MBA

Coordinators :

  • 1) Manish Dhaye : 7757063698
  • 2) Netal Khandelwal :8208285301

Entry Fees : ₹200 Per Team (Max 3 participants)

Prize :

  • 1) Winner : ₹2000
  • 2) Runner Up : ₹1000

Rules & Regulations

  • 1. Bring your College ID-Card and receipt on Event Day
  • 2. The teams will be given a maximum of 10 minutes (8+2) for presentation followed by a question and answer session
  • 3. A paper should be in IEEE Format with an abstract should not exceed 300 words and paper size should be at most 5-10 pages.
  • 4. In the IEEE format, the paper should only be in .docx or .pdf Format
  • 5. PowerPoint Presentation must be designed under the rules that is described in the TEMPLATE PPT.
  • 6. Templates for IEEE paper format and PPT are available on QR Code.
  • 7. While sending your paper please mention the author's name, contact umber and email ID in the Registration link
  • 8. Please bring 2 hard copies of the submitted paper on the day of the event
  • 9. All the participants will be awarded with "Participation Certificates"
  • 10.Online mode is available for participants outside from Amravati University
